_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The spirits present (a list separated by: Some bowed and respectfully circled the Buddha, keeping him on their right side
Some exchanged greetings and polite conversation
Some held up their joined palms toward the Buddha
Some announced their name and clan
